name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging cloud services and automation to create high-performance and efficient solutions. I possess strong expertise in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** practices, ensuring seamless deployment and scalability of applications. My hands-on skills in managing cloud resources like **EC2**, **EKS**, **S3**, and **RDS** empower me to optimize performance and enhance infrastructure reliability.

I have extensive knowledge of application performance profiling and optimization techniques, as well as a solid foundation in software architecture and design patterns. My experience in developing microservices architectures and event-driven systems aligns with the demands of modern DevOps practices. Furthermore, I engage in effective communication and collaboration with cross-functional teams, enhancing productivity and project outcomes.

Additionally, I bring a diverse technical background including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** frameworks, along with expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have integrated AI capabilities in my projects, including large language models and computer vision solutions, driving innovation in healthcare and financial sectors.
